list members heard these loud sounds?  Here's  what one perso=
n writes: 
 
"oh,  you are not alone. i live in=EF=BB=BF Oregon and we have=
 heard it too for 
months. its a  pulsating rumbling sound that pierces you=
r ears, like a low 
frequency of some  kind. I looked it up and it has been=
 reported in several 
states on the east and  west coast, and supposedly al=
l over in different 
countries. it is so frustrating  it makes me feel like=
 my brain is going to 
explode. and I noticed, not everyone  hears it. most=
 ignore it. but I can't. it is 
just too  annoying!"
